name: Almonds
description: Almonds are rich in healthy fats, fiber, and vitamin E, which promote heart health and support skin health. They also help to lower the risk of chronic diseases.

name: Cashews
description: Cashews are a good source of healthy fats and minerals like copper and magnesium, which support heart health and bone health. They also provide antioxidants.

name: Walnuts
description: Walnuts are rich in omega-3 fatty acids, which support brain health and reduce inflammation. They also contain antioxidants and polyphenols

name: Peanuts
description: Peanuts are a good source of protein and healthy fats, promoting satiety and supporting muscle growth and repair.

name: Pumpkin seeds
description: Pumpkin seeds are packed with nutrients like magnesium and zinc, which support immune function and promote healthy sleep.

name: Pista
description: Pistachios, or pista, are nutrient-dense nuts that provide fiber and healthy fats, supporting heart health and aiding in weight management.

name: Hazel nuts
description: Hazelnuts are rich in healthy fats and vitamin E, which support heart health and help protect against oxidative stress.

name: Chest nuts
description: Chestnuts are a good source of fiber, promoting digestive health and aiding in weight management and support immune function and heart health.

name: Coffee nuts
description: Coffee beans, not coffee nuts, are typically used to make coffee. However, coffee beans contain caffeine that can increase alertness and cognitive function.
